definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Scuffing the ball, she says, disrupts the already turbulent external airflow.

sentences.english: The designed thinking of a complex CNC surface grinding machine for turbine cylinder is narrated briefly.

sentences.english: We have also found that sanding sealers have very poor adhesion properties.

sentences.english: He would clean them and polish them until they gleamed.
sentences.chinese: 他清洗，打磨，直到它們閃閃發光。

definition: to sculpt/to carve (jade)/ornate artwork/overly elaborate prose
to sharpen on grindstone/to improve oneself by practice
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
edge and corner/protrusion/sharpness (of a protrusion)/craggy/ridge corner
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
to settle/to precipitate (solid sediment out of a solution)
